QuestData.Title: Snowball Effect
QuestData.Description:
Snowhide gnolls smart. They know you put food on ice, food is good longer. But just ice no good. Magic ice be better!
This be the work of shamans. And they put Frostbite here, so he starve to death next to delicious tuskarr meat.
If $r want help tuskarrs, time running out.
But Frostbite knows how to break the spell.
Why Frostbite help? He no like shamans either.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve $1oa Snowhide Totems from the Snowhide Shamans in the Azure Span.
QuestData.RewardText: So the sneaky shamans are dead?
